name: You Deserve This
description:
A dynamically generated first-person survival horror game in which you must run from your punishment and attempt to escape the ominous halls.

Buy upgrades, collect relics, and avoid monsters. You are completely vulnerable and have no way of fighting back. Face a hulking demon, giant spiders, and creatures that only move when you look away. This won't be easy - prepare to die; you deserve this.

Perks of the full version include:

  • 2 More difficulty settings
  • More room variety

Headphones recommended for the best experience!
